name: Tesla landing page.
type: Practical case with Astro and Tailwind
descriptionEn: I have developed almost the same Tesla's landing website but without any functionality. Welcome to a project where I have had the fortune of facing new challenges and learning the Astro and Tailwind frameworks.

name: Amazon's minimalist website
descriptionEn: Website to search for Amazon's products. It offers the possibility of display the different available products, sorting them alphabetically, filtering by category and name.
AdditionalDescription: When the user clicks on one of them (on one product, pressing 'Details'), users can see a new page with details about the product which has been clicked on and share it.

name: Create sticky notes
descriptionEn: Personal project which make you able to create sticky notes online to do your tasks, chores.

name: Create project cards - server | Proyectos y ya estar√≠a
descriptionEn: This project is design for the creation of business cards for each project and its authors. The cards is created digitally and can be shared.
AdditionalDescription: Can be shared through a link generated automatically by our website.This gives the users the opportunity to present their projects, share information about them and advertise them to a wide audience. Full-stack project.

name: Harry Potter
descriptionEn: Website to search for Harry Potter characters. Users can filter according to different criteria. Furthermore, users can take a look in the details page of each character.

name: Sanz Clima's technical test
descriptionEn: Personal project with information and data related to all the projects.

name: Create profile Cards
descriptionEn: Project to create a virtual card. Website developed by a team of Adalab's students as part of its module 2, which presents a platform with interactive features to create your own business cards and share them.

name: Cocktail finder
descriptionEn: Cocktail's website which consists in search and iflter in a cocktail's list and add or remover your favorite drink.

name: Friend's quotes
descriptionEn: Website which has Friend's quotes which you can filter by character or by sentence. In addition, users can add new phrases and its characters.

name: Guess the number
descriptionEn: Guessing website game which consists in generating a random number where the user has to try to guess it supported by some clues while the user is playing.

name: Desarrollalobas
descriptionEn: Website which consisted of developing a responsive website that served as a presentation for our group based on a given design. The home page boasts a user-friendly and organized layout, completed with links to various sections of the website.

name: We run
descriptionEn: Website which consists of laying out a webpage replicating the Zeplin's given design.

name: Portfolio
descriptionEn: Personal project with information and data related to all the projects.
